br.com.caelum.vraptor.observer.upload

Interface UploadedFile

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonsUploadedFile, DefaultUploadedFile

    public interface UploadedFile
    An interface which represents the information of an uploaded file.
    Author:
    Guilherme Silveira, Paulo Silveira, Lucas Cavalcanti, Ot√°vio Garcia

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getContentType()
      Returns the contentType.
      InputStream getFile()
      Returns the contents of uploaded file.
      String getFileName()
      Returns the fileName of the uploaded as it was uploaded from the client.
      long getSize()
      Returns the size of uploaded file.
      void writeTo(File target)
      Write the current uploaded file to disk.
      void writeTo(OutputStream target)
      Write the current uploaded file to a OutputStream.
      void writeTo(Path target, CopyOption... options)
      Write the current uploaded file to disk.

             throws IOException

      • writeTo

        void writeTo(File target)
      throws IOException
        Write the current uploaded file to disk.
        Parameters:
        target - The target file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • writeTo

        void writeTo(Path target,
             CopyOption... options)
      throws IOException
        Write the current uploaded file to disk. You can define some options when move/copy the file like REPLACE_EXISTING, but there is no guarantees that all implementations supports all options.
        Parameters:
        target - The target file.
        options - Options when write the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • writeTo

        void writeTo(OutputStream target)
      throws IOException
        Write the current uploaded file to a OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        target - The target stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
